      • add

        public java.lang.String add(Goal goal)
        Add method that adds a goal by determining whether or not the goal already exists on that date, or if it belongs to a list of goals for a specified date
        Parameters:
        goal - The goal to be added
        Returns:
        "" If added successfully; error message otherwise

                               java.lang.String year,
                               java.lang.String month,
                               java.lang.String day)
        Remove method that deletes a goal from the big list, only if the goal exists
        Parameters:
        type - The type of goal to be removed
        year - The year the goal belongs to
        month - The month the goal belongs to
        day - The day the goal belongs to
        Returns:
        "" if removed successfully; error message otherwise

      • valid

        public java.lang.Boolean valid(java.lang.String year,
                               java.lang.String month,
                               java.lang.String day)
        Valid method, that checks the goal list to see if it meets the requirements of 4+ goals needed on a specified date
        Parameters:
        year - The year to be checked
        month - The month to be checked
        day - The day to be checked
        Returns:
        true if valid; false if not
